verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁמוֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh [was] eight שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu Josiah בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho; when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty וְאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> ve-'a-Chat one שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech, and walked בְּדַרְכֵי֙ <S%H1870><s%> be-dar-Chei in the ways דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, his father וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- and did not סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> sar and declined יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> ya-Min [neither] to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> u-se-Mol. nor to the left

וּבִשְׁמוֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> u-vish-mo-Neh For in the eighth שָׁנִ֜ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim year לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <S%H4427><s%> le-ma-le-Cho, of his reign וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> o-Den-nu was still נַ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar, while he was yet young הֵחֵ֕ל <S%H2490><s%> he-Chel he began לִדְר֕וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> lid-Roosh to seek לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hei after the God דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father וּבִשְׁתֵּ֧ים <S%H8147><s%> u-vish-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year הֵחֵל֙ <S%H2490><s%> he-Chel he began לְטַהֵ֔ר <S%H2891><s%> le-ta-Her, to purge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah וִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> vi-Ru-sha-Lim, and Jerusalem מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַבָּמוֹת֙ <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-mOt from the high places וְהָ֣אֲשֵׁרִ֔ים <S%H842><s%> ve-Ha-'a-she-Rim, and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֖ים <S%H6456><s%> ve-hap-pe-si-Lim and the carved images וְהַמַּסֵּכֽוֹת׃ <S%H4541><s%> ve-ham-mas-se-Chot. and the molten images

וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <S%H5422><s%> vay-nat-te-Tzu And they brake down לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, in his presence אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מִזְבְּח֣וֹת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot the altars הַבְּעָלִ֔ים <S%H1168><s%> hab-be-'a-Lim, of Baalim וְהַֽחַמָּנִ֛ים <S%H2553><s%> ve-ha-cham-ma-Nim and the images אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- were לְמַ֥עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah that [were] on high above them מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-lei-Hem and גִּדֵּ֑עַ <S%H1438><s%> gid-De-a'; he cut down וְ֠הָאֲשֵׁרִים <S%H842><s%> Ve-ha-'a-she-rim and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֤ים <S%H6456><s%> ve-hap-pe-si-Lim and the carved images וְהַמַּסֵּכוֹת֙ <S%H4541><s%> ve-ham-mas-se-chOt and the molten images שִׁבַּ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> shib-Bar he brake in pieces וְהֵדַ֔ק <S%H1854><s%> ve-he-Dak, and made dust וַיִּזְרֹק֙ <S%H2236><s%> vai-yiz-Rok [of them] and strowed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei [it] upon הַקְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H6913><s%> hak-ke-va-Rim, the graves הַזֹּבְחִ֖ים <S%H2076><s%> haz-zoe-Chim of them that had sacrificed לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְעַצְמוֹת֙ <S%H6106><s%> ve-'atz-mOt the bones כֹּֽהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> ko-ha-Nim, of the priests שָׂרַ֖ף <S%H8313><s%> sa-Raf And he burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and; מִזְבְּחֹותָים miz-be-cho-taim כמִזְבְּחֹותָ֑ם <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-cho-Tam; altar קוַיְטַהֵ֥ר <S%H2891><s%> vay-ta-Her and cleansed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. and Jerusalem

וּבְעָרֵ֨י <S%H5892><s%> u-ve-'a-Rei And [so did he] in the cities מְנַשֶּׁ֧ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh וְאֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> ve-'ef-Ra-yim and Ephraim וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> ve-shim-'on and Simeon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far נַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li; even unto Naphtali; בָּהַר <S%H2719><s%> ba-har dagger כבָּתֵּיהֶם bat-tei-hem כבְּחַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> be-char-vo-tei-Hem court קסָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וַיְנַתֵּ֣ץ <S%H5422><s%> vay-nat-Tetz And when he had broken down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמִּזְבְּח֗וֹת <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-be-Chot, the altars וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאֲשֵׁרִ֤ים <S%H842><s%> ha-'a-she-Rim and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִים֙ <S%H6456><s%> ve-hap-pe-si-Lim the graven images כִּתַּ֣ת <S%H3807><s%> kit-Tat and had beaten לְהֵדַ֔ק <S%H1854><s%> le-he-Dak, into powder וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הַֽחַמָּנִ֥ים <S%H2553><s%> ha-cham-ma-Nim all the idols גִּדַּ֖ע <S%H1438><s%> gid-Da' and cut down בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol throughout אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz throughout all the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov he returned לִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> li-ru-sha-Lim. to Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וּבִשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> u-vish-Nat year שְׁמוֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> le-ma-le-Cho, of his reign לְטַהֵ֥ר <S%H2891><s%> le-ta-Her when he had purged הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land וְהַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> ve-hab-Ba-yit; and the house שָׁ֠לַח <S%H7971><s%> lach he sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁפָ֨ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan Shaphan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲצַלְיָ֜הוּ <S%H683><s%> 'a-tzal-Ya-hu of Azaliah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַעֲשֵׂיָ֣הוּ <S%H4641><s%> ma-'a-se-Ya-hu and Maaseiah שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> sar- the governor הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city וְ֠אֵת <S%H853><s%> Ve-'et יוֹאָ֤ח <S%H3098><s%> yo-'Ach and Joah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יֽוֹאָחָז֙ <S%H3099><s%> yo-'a-Chaz of Joahaz הַמַּזְכִּ֔יר <S%H2142><s%> ham-maz-Kir, the recorder לְחַזֵּ֕ק <S%H2388><s%> le-chaz-Zek to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav. his God

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u And when they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ׀ <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Ya-hu to Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, the high וַֽיִּתְּנוּ֮ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu they delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּסֶף֮ <S%H3701><s%> hak-ke-Sef the money הַמּוּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> ham-mu-Va that was brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- into the house אֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָסְפֽוּ־ <S%H622><s%> 'a-se-fu- had gathered הַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim which the Levites שֹׁמְרֵ֨י <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rei that kept הַסַּ֜ף <S%H5592><s%> has-Saf the doors מִיַּ֧ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad of the hand מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh וְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> ve-'ef-Ra-yim, and Ephraim וּמִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> u-mik-Kol all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit and of all the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-mik-kol- all יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah and of all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> u-vin-ya-Min; and Benjamin; וְיֹשְׁבֵי ve-yo-she-vei כוַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu abide קיְרֽוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-Ru-sha-Lim. to Jerusalem

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu, And they put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- into יַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> yad [it] in the hand עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh that wrought הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah, and the workmen הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> ham-muf-ka-Dim that had the oversight בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu and they gave אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To עוֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> o-Sei were working הַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah, and the workmen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עֹשִׂים֙ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim were working בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD לִבְדּ֥וֹק <S%H918><s%> liv-Dok to repair וּלְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> u-le-chaz-Zek and amend הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. the house

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu, gave לֶחָֽרָשִׁים֙ <S%H2796><s%> le-cha-ra-Shim Even to the artificers וְלַבֹּנִ֔ים <S%H1129><s%> ve-lab-bo-Nim, and builders לִקְנוֹת֙ <S%H7069><s%> lik-nOt they [it] to buy אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> 'av-Nei stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <S%H4274><s%> mach-Tzev, hewn וְעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> ve-'e-Tzim and timber לַֽמְחַבְּר֑וֹת <S%H4226><s%> lam-chab-be-Rot; for couplings וּלְקָרוֹת֙ <S%H7136><s%> u-le-ka-rOt and to floor אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> hab-Bat-Tim, the houses אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הִשְׁחִ֖יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> hish-Chi-tu had destroyed מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei which the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֩ <S%H582><s%> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim And the men עֹשִׂ֨ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim did בֶּאֱמוּנָ֜ה <S%H530><s%> be-'e-mu-Nah faithfully בַּמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> bam-me-la-Chah, the work וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם׀ <S%H5921><s%> va-'a-lei-Hem over מֻ֠פְקָדִים <S%H6485><s%> Muf-ka-dim to set [it] forward יַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> Ya-chat of them [were] Jahath וְעֹבַדְיָ֤הוּ <S%H5662><s%> ve-'oad-Ya-hu and Obadiah הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim the Levites מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons מְרָרִ֔י <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri, of Merari וּזְכַרְיָ֧ה <S%H2148><s%> u-ze-char-Yah and Zechariah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֛ם <S%H4918><s%> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֖ים <S%H6956><s%> hak-ke-ha-Tim of the sons of the Kohathites לְנַצֵּ֑חַ <S%H5329><s%> le-natz-Tze-ach; and the overseers וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-Hal-vi-Yim, and [other of] the Levites כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מֵבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> me-Vin all that could skill בִּכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> bich-lei- of instruments שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> Shir. of musick

וְעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al over הַסַּבָּלִ֗ים <S%H5449><s%> has-sab-ba-Lim, Also [they were] over the bearers of burdens וּֽמְנַצְּחִים֙ <S%H5329><s%> u-me-natz-tze-Chim and [were] overseers לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh of all that wrought מְלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah, the work לַעֲבוֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dah in any manner of service וַעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <S%H5656><s%> va-'a-vo-Dah; to job וּמֵֽהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> u-me-hal-vi-Yim, and of the Levites סוֹפְרִ֥ים <S%H5608><s%> sof-Rim [there were] scribes וְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <S%H7860><s%> ve-sho-te-Rim and officers וְשׁוֹעֲרִֽים׃ <S%H7778><s%> ve-sho-'a-Rim. and porters

וּבְהוֹצִיאָ֣ם <S%H3318><s%> u-ve-ho-tzi-'Am And when they brought out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef, the money הַמּוּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> ham-mu-Va that was brought into בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD מָצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza found חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Ya-hu Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer a book תּֽוֹרַת־ <S%H8451><s%> to-rat- of the law יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- [given] by מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses
